name: Question pour un Ballon (GameJam)
description:
Question pour un ballon is a Quizz game (FR) where your objective is to gather hints in a limited time to answer the question at the end of the timer. If you get a right answer at the quizz you'll get a balloon which is going to allow you to get to the next destination if you have enough.

The quizz's question are centered around Paris and Montreal.
